Articles.Content:
I've played KSP on my computer a lot, with many different versions. I have never had a problem until 1.0.5. When I start it, the mouse pointer changes and KSP shows on the taskbar, but that's it. Other than a crash report which I will provide. Rolling back to 1.0.4 makes the game work again, so I have to doubt its something to do with my computer, the details of which I will also give. I have tried a clean installation. I believe it has something to do with the launcher, but loading the exe directly has these same results. All of my drivers are up to date.

Operating System: Windows 7 Ultimate 64-bit (6.1, Build 7601) Service Pack 1
Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i5-2400 CPU @ 3.10GHz (4 CPUs), ~3.1GHz
Memory: 8192MB RAM
GPU: Nvidia gtx980

http://www.megafileupload.com/6avx/crash.dmp
http://www.megafileupload.com/6avy/error.log
http://www.megafileupload.com/6avz/output_log.txt
http://www.megafileupload.com/eyNE/report.ini
http://www.megafileupload.com/eyNJ/output_log.txt
 

http://www.megafileupload.com/eyNH/DxDiag.txt
 

Restarting Steam seems to have worked. Strange.
